attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: Worst App EVERR!! It’s gives me glitches and it almost gave me a virus don’t even think about downloading it unless u want to mess up your phone I mean come on mow

attributes.title: Horrible, disgusting and distasteful!!
attributes.review: I was so disgusted by this app and the person that it shows as a “president” that I started violently shaking. I am absolutely appalled right now🤢 100% do not recommend.

attributes.title: STINKY
attributes.review: If I could give this app a zero I WOULD. This app is much like our president- useless. AWFUL APP, someone please take it down there’s so many bugs and I believe it’s corrupting the system. Xoxo

attributes.title: Soo bad
attributes.review: I wanted to get this app because I wanted to find a reason to vote for him , but I still can’t find a reason :( . This app made my phone smell like hot Cheetos for some reason :( 🆘 . So I’m sad 😢

attributes.title: For Donald Trump
attributes.review: Your “app” is trash   All I see is a fat orange potato it’s disgusting  I am writing this review For you to NOT take down tick-tock GEN Z will hunt you down but the worst thing is YOUR A GEMINI why are you the same zodiac sign as me I am so mad 💅🏽🥺😁😂😂🧚🏼🧚🏼🧚🏼🧚🏼💅🏽💅🏽💅🏽

attributes.title: 🧚💕Trump 2020💕🧚But on a gravestone💕🧚
attributes.review: I thought this app had maybe something to vote for him, but it didn’t. The president that you have in office right now is racist, homophobic, and many more things.

attributes.title: THE APP IS NOT WORTH THE TIME
attributes.review: It glitches multiple times and I never got any text I tried giving it a chance but I can’t anymore. Do not download this app it’s terrible

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: This app is so glitchy it made my phone glitch I tried to download the app to find better ways to support trump.

attributes.title: made my phone glitch
attributes.review: this app made my phone glitch really badly😬😤🙄i had to pay $180 for it to get fixed😓😵horrible HORRIBLE app, it will ruin your phone trust me😳🤕😒

attributes.title: We could do better
attributes.review: A real president who looks out fit it’s people should not be apart of the problem, but Trump is. Time to get these old whites guys out of office
